name: Microwave Beef Lasagne Plates with Salad and Warm Rolls
description: Family-friendly beef lasagne heated in the microwave, served with a tossed salad and warm rolls. Zero chili heat and ready fast for busy weeknights.
prep_steps: Read heating instructions on the beef lasagne ready meal.
Place the beef lasagne ready meal on a microwave-safe plate; cut a small vent in the film if required.
Open the salad and keep the salad dressing nearby.
Arrange rolls on a microwave-safe plate; cover with a slightly damp paper towel.
Set out plates, forks, and serving spoons.
cook_steps: Microwave the beef lasagne ready meal per package directions until hot throughout; let it rest 1–2 minutes.
Microwave the rolls for 20–30 seconds until warm.
Toss the salad with salad dressing to taste.
Serve lasagne onto plates with a side of salad and a warm roll.
